input_text:
Job Title: Program Manager (End-of-Life Software/End-of-Support Software)

Location: Redmond, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, TEKsystems c/o Allegis Group, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Program Manager (End-of-Life Software/End-of-Support Software) / 100% Remote / Support Pacific Standard Time Business Hours

***Candidates must have proven experience with retiring services, end-of-life software/tools, end-of-support, and communicating with internal teams, working through the process, etc.***

Required Skills

Must have experience in retiring services, end-of-life software/tools, end-of-support, and communicating with internal teams, working through the process, etc.Experience with software services and retirement of those servicesExperience in research and report generationExperience with data analysis and visualization

Job Description

This role provides the opportunity to experience and insight into the support business of the company for its largest app and service organization.This team supports planners in customer support business in high level engagement with groups who need customer support scenarios.The role will consist of 60% Heads down planning designing 20% Meetings 20% Communication

Candidate Requirements

Candidates must have excellent time management skillsCandidates must be detail oriented with proven organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.Proven ability producing high quality work, and meeting deadlines.

About TEKsystems:

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

High level engagement with groups needing customer support scenarios
